---
category: news
title: "China pushes homegrown GPS for self-driving cars"
excerpt: "China is encouraging carmakers to adopt the domestically developed Beidou satellite navigation system in their automated vehicles, apparently to steer them away from the U.S. government's GPS. The advice comes in a new Ministry of Industry and Information Technology notice that calls on carmakers to strengthen data management."
